articles.author: Kate Bartlett
articles.title: Nigeria searches for hundreds of kidnapped children - NPR
articles.description: In just a week there have been two mass kidnappings in Nigeria. Hundreds of women and children have been kidnapped in recent days in Africa's most populous country.
articles.content: Gunmen attacked a school in Nigeria's northwest region Thursday morning and abducted between 200 and 300 students, according to authorities, marking the second mass abduction in the West African nati… [+4741 chars]
